transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, Nandi mam, mai Anupam baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Anupam, kaha se sir call kar rahe hai?
Executive: Cognitic se, Cognitic. haa, kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Lead nahi aa rahe. Kuch lead nahi aa rahe hai.
Executive: Achha ek thoda ye add kar do na, kya bolte hai, DLP DLP hai na?
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute sir, mai add karti hu, ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Ek DLP solution hai na?
Customer: Kya add karu?
Executive: DLP, DLP.
Customer: DLP?
Executive: Haa haa, DLP solution dekho.
Customer: DLP solution. Aap dekho aapke IndiaMART me hoga, ek minute rukiye, ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Data leak prevention, data leak prevention.
Customer: DLP. Bas haa data loss, loss matlab kya bolte hai?
Customer: Data loss prevention.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: Ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Prevention solution na?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Thik hai, kar diya sir ye maine add. Aur kya add karna hai?
Executive: Priceing vagera kya rakhe?
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Price, price bata dijiye iska.
Executive: Haa, haa boliye, price kya rakhe?
Customer: Price, price abhi maine kuch nahi rakha, aap mujhe batayenge price tab mai rakh dungi na.
Executive: Haa haa, thik hai, data loss prevention services, thik hai. Aap mujhe batao price kya rakhna hai?
Executive: Price aap, ek minute. Price aap daal do.
Executive: 3500 per year daal do.
Customer: Per year?
Executive: Haa, 3500 per year.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai, ye maine add kar diya hai, ab aap kya bol rahe the aap bataiye, aur koi product add karna hai?
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Aur koi product add karna hai iske alava?
Executive: Nahi nahi ye wala kar do, thik hai.
Customer: Ye wala to kar diya hai, ab kya bol rahe the aap, bylead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haa haa.
Customer: Sir dekho maine na aaj hi call, haa aaj hi call kiya tha aap bahar gaye hue the. Sir computer AMC service ka itna aa raha hai, temporary staffing service ka aa raha hai aapka, laptop repairing service ka aa raha hai, technical support service ka aa raha hai, hai na? Iske alava aapka IT solutions me kaafi bylead aa raha hai. Aur sir aapka Dell, Dell ke software repairing ka aa raha hai, thik hai? Aur bhi aur aapka dekho sir staffing wala bhi bahut aa raha hai, aapka networking solution me customer aa raha hai.
Customer: Aapne open karke dekha?
Executive: Wo shayad bahar ka aa raha hoga wo, hai na?
Customer: Bahar se aap, aap open karke dekhna sir, kaafi customer aa rahe hai aur kaafi bylead hai. Aap dekho sir mai ek baat aapko batau. Aap abhi naye naye aaye ho IndiaMART pe ek mahine, ek mahina hi hua hai, thik hai? Aap nagar ye open use abhi se nahi karoge sir to customer ka footfall kam ho jayega, customer vaise hi nahi aayega. Kyu nahi aayega? Kyuki sir abhi nayi company hai, aapko aur jyada active hona chahiye naya naya me to.
Customer: Hai na? Ki koi bylead aaye aap turant dekho aapse.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi ho sir ek mahine me sirf 9 din use kiya hai, 9 din use karne se matlab hai ki 9 din bas bylead uthaya hai sir.
Executive: Hmm, kam hai.
Customer: Calls utha rahe ho aap, customer ke ek mahine me 9 call aaye hai aap calls utha rahe ho.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab sir bylead 9, 9 din hi uthai hai aapne.
Executive: Matlab phone utha, sir aise to nahi milega na business. Matlab kya sir? Matlab phone, phone ke sath bol rahe ho ki mujhe har din pe choose karna hai aisa baat bol rahe ho?
Customer: Daily use karna hai sir, aapko week me 17 bylead hum kyu dete hai? Ek week me 7 din hote hai hum 17 bylead de rahe hai aap do do teen teen daily use karo.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Jisse aapko aur customer aayega na sir, footfall increase hota hai aap daily do do teen teen karke use karoge to. Achha. Haa, abhi aap use nahi karoge to customer thoda sa fir decrease ho jata hai, fir dekho sir aapko fir vahi hai fresh bylead kam se hoga fir inquiry aur call ka bhi sir dekho bylead se relate hi hota hai. Aapko active rehna hai, aapko koi inquiry aa raha hai aapko lead manager check karna hai. Abhi dekhiye koi inquiry aaya hai kya lead manager me?
Executive: Aaj ka to lead manager me ek minute dekhta hu. Aaj ek call aaya tha matlab wo uske upar humne. Inquiry pata hai na sir? Koi samne se aapko message karta hai to wo inquiry hota hai. Haa. Haa haa haa, aaya tha. Hai na? Haa. To dekhiye kisi ka aaya hoga to unko reply kijiye, unpe call kijiye, bylead pe sir call kijiye.
Executive: Hmm. Iske alava calls to aap utha hi rahe ho. Aise milega sir business mai aapko sir kitna bhi aapka category achha kar du, kitna bhi achhe se aapka catalog bana du, jab tak aap achhe se use nahi karoge business nahi aayega.
Executive: Are madam bana do thoda catalog achhe se customer ko.
Customer: Bahut achhe se bana hai sir aapka catalog sara mapping sab thik hai but aapko use karna padega na sir, hum to internet pe kaam kar rahe hai, kar rahe hai, kar rahe hai. Aap se use karna proper start karo.
Executive: Nahi nahi use kar rahe hai abhi yehi use kar rahe hai. Aapne aaj bhi koi bylead use nahi kari hai, kal uthai thi sir aur uske pehle aapne. Aaj aaj aaj ek aaj ek call aaya tha uske upar humne wo baat chit kiya. Wo call aaya tha call sir alag chiz ho gayi na, IndiaMART aapko teen tarike se business de rahi hai. Bylead aapko use karna hai, inquiry se call aapko karna hai, direct calls to aapko aayenge, teen tarike se hai na business to.
Executive: Okay. Bylead bhi to use karenge, bylead to balance hamara bekar ja raha hai fir, lapse ho raha hai, expire ho raha hai.
Executive: Lapse ho raha hai correct. Hai na? To aap bylead uthao aaj, do se teen bylead ko use karo aaj.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Thik hai? Baki mai yaha pe sir 9696 pe aapne call kar diya to fir concern raise ho gaya hai, mai concern close kar deti hu aisa koi. Thik hai thik hai. Ye thoda add kar do, bylead vagera kar diya. Kar diya hai maine haa. Kar diya aap check kar lena add kar diya hai. Thik hai thoda. Baki mai kuch mapping vagera aur dekh leti hu apne end se jo kuch mere end se ho payega. Haa sahi hai 25 score dikha raha hai, ye madam 25 score aa raha hai isko thoda sa. Description, description abhi dalna baki hai abhi mai dal rahi hu description. Haa wo thoda dalo aur website ke related na mujhe kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai. Jo website ke related, website ke related na, kuch bhi queries nahi aa raha, website ka thoda sa dekho to wo proper hai ki nahi hai. Ek minute dijiye.
Customer: Website development ka aapka product to badhiya dala hua hai website development service me, mai ek category aur add kar deti hu aapka website designing service kar deti hu. Haa haa aaj sir na wo sabhi aa rahe hai lekin isko thoda kya upar sakte hai aise matlab ye aisa nahi hai ki isme kya kya ho raha hai, humko nahi hai. Chalo mai dekho mai yaha pe aur keyword vagera add kar. Haa thoda sa kuch achha karo na uske liye thoda aapke, kyuki mai itna bhi matlab dekh raha hu wo sabhi me aa rahe hai almost queries but iske liye kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai, website ke liye bhi kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai. Bola tha na ki aap upar search karke dekha karo. Search karke aap dekh rahe ho bylead. Website designing service vagera search kar liya karo, thik hai? Ab aapki mai haa baki maine add kar diya hai, mai to yaha se aapka concern close kar du maine ek aur website ka product add kar diya hai. Haa haa haa.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants to add DLP solution to profile.

- Website related queries are not coming.



Resolution:

- Executive added DLP solution to profile.

- Executive added website designing service category.

- Executive explained how to use byleads daily.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, dlp solution, website, profile update
